items.title: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear
items.creator: Ryan Martin
items.context: Do whatever brings you to life, then. Follow your own fascinations, obsessions, and compulsions. Trust them. Create whatever causes a revolution in your heart.

items.title: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear
items.creator: Ryan Martin
items.context: The universe buries strange jewels deep within us all, and then stands back to see if we can find them.

items.title: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear
items.creator: Ryan Martin
items.context: Be the weirdo who dares to enjoy.

items.title: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear
items.creator: Ryan Martin
items.context: You can measure your worth by your dedication to your path, not by your successes or failures.
